product.title: B for Buffalo Chenille Patch
product.description: B is for Buffalo. Everyone knows Oxford Pennant is loud and proud when it comes to Buffalo, and obviously, B wouldn't stand for anything else (other than maybe the Bills). So we created this custom B chenille patch to help you be loud and proud too. Size: 5.5" x 7.5" Color: Blue and white
product.descriptionHtml:
B is for Buffalo. Everyone knows Oxford Pennant is loud and proud when it comes to Buffalo, and obviously, B wouldn't stand for anything else (other than maybe the Bills). So we created this custom B chenille patch to help you be loud and proud too. 

Size: 5.5" x 7.5"

Color: Blue and white
